page.title: 04Social Life
page.content: Grimethorpe has three public houses. {Grimethorpe Hotel}in the Village.The {Manor}near the Elizabethan Manor House is in Red-City and serves meals at lunch time.The{Red Rum}named after the Grand National Winner,is in White City. There are three Working Mens Clubs in Grimethorpe.The{Institute,}the{Miners {Welfare Club}and the{Ex-Servicemens {Club.} The public houses and clubs are a major part of adult social life in the village.Each of the clubs has darts, snooker, football, pool, and fishing clubs which enter local leagues. Various fund raising activities are held each week usually to raise money for children or the elderly and national charities. Outings and parties are organised for children and the elderly each year.
